languages.text: "Помилуйте, нет-нет! Итак..." {n}Губернатор торопливо оправляет наряд.{/n} "Что же, пришел час, которого мы все так ждали — великое пиршество!"
"N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте, нет-нет! Итак..." {n}Губернатор торопливо оправляет наряд.{/n} "Что же, пришел час, которого мы все так ждали — великое пиршество!"

traits.locale_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"
"N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"
"N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

"N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"
"N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

languages.text: “一……一点都没有！没有！呃，既然如此……”{n}总督迅速整理了一下自己的制服。{/n}“既然如此，我们期待已久的时刻终于到来了！盛宴正式开始！”
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

traits.locale_text: “一……一点都没有！没有！呃，既然如此……”{n}总督迅速整理了一下自己的制服。{/n}“既然如此，我们期待已久的时刻终于到来了！盛宴正式开始！”

languages.text: «¡N-no, qué va! Bueno, a ver...». {n}El gobernador se arregla rápidamente la ropa.{/n} «Quiero decir, que por fin ha llegado la hora que todos estábamos esperando: ¡que comience el gran banquete!».
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

traits.locale_text: «¡N-no, qué va! Bueno, a ver...». {n}El gobernador se arregla rápidamente la ropa.{/n} «Quiero decir, que por fin ha llegado la hora que todos estábamos esperando: ¡que comience el gran banquete!».

languages.text: "Asla, hayır! Şey, ben..." {n}Vali, hızla elbisesini düzeltiyor.{/n} "Hepimizin beklediği an işte geldi. Büyük ziyafet başlasın!"
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

traits.locale_text: "Asla, hayır! Şey, ben..." {n}Vali, hızla elbisesini düzeltiyor.{/n} "Hepimizin beklediği an işte geldi. Büyük ziyafet başlasın!"

languages.text: 「い、いえ、まったくそんなことはありません！さて…」{n}総督は急いで身なりを整える。{/n}「待ち望んでいた時間がやってきました。素晴らしい宴会を始めましょう！」
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

traits.locale_text: 「い、いえ、まったくそんなことはありません！さて…」{n}総督は急いで身なりを整える。{/n}「待ち望んでいた時間がやってきました。素晴らしい宴会を始めましょう！」

languages.text: « P-pas du tout, non ! Dans ce cas... » {n}Le gouverneur ajuste rapidement sa tenue.{/n} « C'est-à-dire que le moment que nous attendions tous est enfin arrivé : que le grand festin commence ! »
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"

traits.locale_text: « P-pas du tout, non ! Dans ce cas... » {n}Le gouverneur ajuste rapidement sa tenue.{/n} « C'est-à-dire que le moment que nous attendions tous est enfin arrivé : que le grand festin commence ! »

languages.text: "G-Ganz und gar nicht, nein! Also ... {n}Der Gouverneurin streicht seine Kleidung glatt.{/n} "Will sagen, die Stunde, auf die wir alle gewartet haben, ist endlich gekommen: Lasset das große Festmahl beginnen!"
languages.original_text: "N-not at all, no! Well, then..." {n}The governor quickly adjusts his dress.{/n} "That is to say, the hour we have all been waiting for has come at last — let the great feast begin!"
